actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation

official_title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the Molalla River in the State of Oregon, as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
short_title: Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act (the Act) to designate specified segments of the Molalla River in Oregon as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Renames the Squaw Creek in Oregon as Wychus Creek.

titles.title: Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the Molalla River in the State of Oregon, as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
